text: vanankalilum, pumiyilum ullavai (anaittum) allahvukke uriyana. Innum, unkal ullankalil iruppatai ninkal velippatuttinalum, allatu atai ninkal maraittalum, allah ataip parri unkalaik kanakku ketpan - innum, tan natiyavarai mannippan; tan natiyavarai vetanaiyum ceyvan - allah anaittup porutkal mitum caktiyutaiyavan
